channel.title: Education on Dripping Data
channel.description: Recent content in Education on Dripping Data

item.title: Association between Years at a Private School and Academic Achievement
item.description: The kids brought home their yearbooks this past week, and it was time to settle a question that I have had for a long time. Do kids who enter their private school at kindergarten do better or worse than the kids who enter later? Methods At this school there are two honor rolls (Headmaster’s List and Honor Roll). To get Headmaster’s List, a student must achieve a 3.5 grade point average with no grade below a B-.
